summary: A romantic comedy which tells the journey of three restless young people who junk society's syllabus for finding love and decide to follow their heart.
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput|Parineeti Chopra|Vaani Kapoor|Rishi Kapoor|Imtiaz Ahmad|Bhuvan Arora|Ankush Bali|Ramakant Dayma|Aman Dhanwani|Alex Gabriel|Mahesh Ginnilal|Priyanka Jain|Pratik Jaiswal|Jasbir Jassi|Banwari Jhol|Sharmila Joshi|Anuja Kashyap|Vishal Kunar|Megha Lalwaani|Amit Mahoday|Nalneesh|Nalneesh Neel|Anuj Pandit|Mohit Parihar|Jitendra Parmar|Manya Rawat|Karnesh Sharma|Rajesh Sharma|Tripti Sharma|Hemchandra Tamhankar|Tarun Vyas|Craig Winkler
title: Shuddh Desi Romance
